titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2669) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to section 601 of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2008.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-224, by Ms. Sutton.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and Labor now printed in the bill, modified by the amendment printed in part A of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 82.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 531.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 198 (Roll no. 607).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 197 (Roll no. 608).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/11/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2669 (College Cost Reduction Act of 2007).
